INTERSHOP IOM 4.5.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision cce13b69941ab5535fdde6b1ebc7dd9c6a6741b9)

Table oms.AdditionalSearchableAttributesDO

Configuration table to register additional properties to be considered by OMT searches. For now only usable to add order properties as additional order number references.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL nextval('"AdditionalSearchableAttributesDO_id_seq"')  
searchType text NOT_NULL Define which search will be extended. For now ony 'orderNumberSearch' is accepted. 
propertyKey text NOT_NULL key to consider. In which table the key/values are located depend on the searchType. for now, only OrderPropertyDO is used. Note that property groups are not considered. 
referenceName text A name for the key or a group of keys. Used in OMT to limit the search results to those keys only.. 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY AdditionalSearchableAttributesDO_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) 
CHECK CONSTRAINT AdditionalSearchableAttributesDO_ck CHECK ("searchType" = 'orderNumberSearch'::text)
